text: yō janaḥ kiñcana dinaṁ viśēṣaṁ manyatē sa prabhubhaktyā tan manyatē, yaśca janaḥ kimapi dinaṁ viśēṣaṁ na manyatē sō'pi prabhubhaktyā tanna manyatē; aparañca yaḥ sarvvāṇi bhakṣyadravyāṇi bhuṅktē sa prabhubhaktayā tāni bhuṅktē yataḥ sa īśvaraṁ dhanyaṁ vakti, yaśca na bhuṅktē sō'pi prabhubhaktyaiva na bhuñjāna īśvaraṁ dhanyaṁ brūtē|
